tls:text.tls:line: If officials in the [rural] districts do not adhere to the system of laws,

when executing his laws and orders

If the statutes and orders are clear,

seg.line: 忠臣之欲明法術以致主之所欲而除主之所惡者，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 忠臣之欲明法術以致主之所欲而除主之所惡者，
tls:text.tls:line: Loyal ministers are ones who wish to clarify political methods based on law in order to achieve what the ruler wished and eliminate what the ruler hates.505

seg.line: 生殺之柄不制於主而在群下，

tls:text.tls:line: The enlightened ruler, inside his state, puts into practice his laws and regulations/system of administrative procedures
is achieved by being judicious in respect to one's methods6 and procecures.
is achieved by being judicious in respect to one's methods6 and procecures.

tls:text.tls:line: Cast it beyond the seas to avoid becoming its captive.

sense.def: read qùshēng: regard as possessed of lesser authority, put last

tls:text.tls:line: "When city and suburban walls have been destroyed
and the altars to Land and Grain no longer receive blood and food sacrifices,

sense.def: receive blood sacrifice; be sacrificed to with bloody victims [cf. 肉食者]

tls:text.tls:line: The altars of Land and Grain take preceedence over family relations.
Prestige and power are more to be valued than ranks and salaries.'
These all work together like the chest and arms.
who was only a foot tall, but who appeared completely human.
and [were in perfect accord with] all men and things12 became sovereigns.

sense.def: men and animals; men or other creatures; men or animals

seg.line: 或赤或青或黃或白或黑。五沃五物，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 或赤或青或黃或白或黑。五沃五物，
tls:text.tls:line: red, green, yellow, white, or black.
